title: Add Imperator validator
summary: Imperator is a trusted PoS validator and blockchain infrastructure service provider specializing in node operations, RPC endpoints, dedicated nodes, relayers, data APIs, and indexers. With 4 years of experience in end-to-end infrastructure management and scalability support for blockchain foundations, we proudly support 50+ networks with over $400M in TVL. Our clients include some of the most respected names in the industry, such as Distributed Global, Flowdesk, Selini Capital, the dYdX Trading Team & Foundation, BitGo, Anchorage, Copper, Axelar, Leap Wallet, and many others.
